<CustomBuild Include="qmldir">
      <AdditionalInputs Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='Release|x64'">qmldir;%(AdditionalInputs)</AdditionalInputs>
      <Command Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='Release|x64'">$(QINSTALL) qmldir F:\qt\Src\qtpurchasing\qml\QtPurchasing\qmldir</Command>
      <Message Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='Release|x64'">COPY qmldir</Message>
      <Outputs Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='Release|x64'">F:\qt\Src\qtpurchasing\qml\QtPurchasing\qmldir;%(Outputs)</Outputs>
    </CustomBuild>
